Material used.Description: Kinase reactions were performed in duplicate at room temperature in Kinase Buffer S (50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.5, 10 mM MgCl2, 1 mM EGTA, 0.01% Brij-35) with 2 mM DTT, 400 µM LRRKtide, variable amounts of cold ATP, and 0.5 µCi y32P ATP at a final volume of 30 µL.

Readout description.Result Description: The ATP Km,app value for G2019S (169 µM) to be approximately 3-fold higher than wild-type LRRK2 (51 µM), whereas the specific activity for G2019S was approximately 3-fold higher.

The ATP Km for I2020T was found to be 7.5 ± 0.4 µM, which is 7-fold lower than that for wild-type LRRK2. The Vmax for 12020T was found to be 44 nmol/(min mg), which is 3-fold lower than that for wild-type LRRK2.

Technical replicates.Description: Kinase reactions were performed in duplicate

Material used.Description: Kinase reactions were performed in 10 µL volumes in black, low-volume 384-well plates (Corning #3676), with 400 nM Fluorescein-ERM (LRRKtide) substrate and 1% DMSO (residual from compound dilutions), in Kinase Buffer S supplemented with 2 mM DTT.

Readout description.Result Description: At ATP Km,app, IC50 values for sunitinb were similar for all LRRK2 variants: 71, 74, and 75 µM for wild-type, G2019S, and I2020T, respectively. However, with ATP at 1 mM wild-type LRRK2 had an IC50 of 370 nM whereas I2020T was incompletely inhibited and had an IC50 value of at least 5 µM. G2019S was modestly more sensitive to inhibition than wild-type LRRK2 with an IC50 value of 230 nM.

At ATP Km,app, IC50 values for sunitinb were similar for all LRRK2 variants: 71, 74, and 75 µM for wild-type, G2019S, and I2020T, respectively. However, with ATP at 1 mM wild-type LRRK2 had an IC50 of 370 nM whereas I2020T was incompletely inhibited and had an IC50 value of at least 5 µM. G2019S was modestly more sensitive to inhibition than wild-type LRRK2 with an IC50 value of 230 nM.

Technical replicates.Description: All assays were performed using either three or four replicates for each data point represented.

Material used.Description: Binding assays [14] were performed in 384-well low volume plates (Corning #3676) at room temperature. All binding assays and reagents dilutions were performed in Kinase Buffer S with 2 mM DTT. Final reactions conditions were 10 nM Kinase Tracer 236, 5 nM kinase, 2 nM Eu-anti-GST antibody, variable amounts of test compound (ATP or inhibitor), and 1% residual DMSO (for inhibitors).

Readout description.Result Description: ATP affinities were compared among the LRRK2 variants with the TR-FRET competitive binding assay. The affinities were 39 ± 1, 4.5 ± 1, and 75 ± 1 µM for wild-type, I2020T, and G2019S, respectively. Thus, consistent with the Km determinations, I2020T has an approximately 9-fold higher affinity for ATP, whereas the ATP affinity of G2019S is about 2-fold lower than wild-type LRRK2.

ATP affinities were compared among the LRRK2 variants with the TR-FRET competitive binding assay. The affinities were 39 ± 1, 4.5 ± 1, and 75 ± 1 µM for wild-type, I2020T, and G2019S, respectively. Thus, consistent with the Km determinations, I2020T has an approximately 9-fold higher affinity for ATP, whereas the ATP affinity of G2019S is about 2-fold lower than wild-type LRRK2.
